20101208013732.429|20101208013733.857|CCO|SPENDING A LITTLE MORE,
20101208013733.857|20101208013735.286|CCO|BORROWING A LITTLE MORE
20101208013735.286|20101208013736.714|CCO|AND MOVING FORWARD.
